verses.verse: And <WG2532> he entered <WG1684> <WG5631> into <WG1519> a ship <WG4143>, and passed over <WG1276> <WG5656>, and <WG2532> came <WG2064> <WG5627> into <WG1519> his own <WG2398> city <WG4172>.

And <WG2532>, behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, they brought <WG4374> <WG5707> to him <WG846> a man sick of the palsy <WG3885>, lying <WG906> <WG5772> on <WG1909> a bed <WG2825>: and <WG2532> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> seeing <WG1492> <WG5631> their <WG846> faith <WG4102> said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto the sick of the palsy <WG3885>; Son <WG5043>, be of good cheer <WG2293> <WG5720>; thy <WG4675> sins <WG266> be forgiven <WG863> <WG5769> thee <WG4671>.
And <WG2532>, behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, certain <WG5100> of the scribes <WG1122> said <WG2036> <WG5627> within <WG1722> themselves <WG1438>, This <WG3778> man blasphemeth <WG987> <WG5719>.

And <WG2532> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> knowing <WG1492> <WG5631> their <WG846> thoughts <WG1761> said <WG2036> <WG5627>, Wherefore <WG2444> think <WG1760> <WG5736> ye <WG5210> evil <WG4190> in <WG1722> your <WG5216> hearts <WG2588>?

For <WG1063> whether <WG5101> is <WG2076> <WG5748> easier <WG2123>, to say <WG2036> <WG5629>, Thy sins <WG266> be forgiven <WG863> <WG5769> thee <WG4671>; or <WG2228> to say <WG2036> <WG5629>, Arise <WG1453> <WG5669>, and <WG2532> walk <WG4043> <WG5720>?

But <WG1161> that <WG2443> ye may know <WG1492> <WG5762> that <WG3754> the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> hath <WG2192> <WG5719> power <WG1849> on <WG1909> earth <WG1093> to forgive <WG863> <WG5721> sins <WG266>, (then <WG5119> saith he <WG3004> <WG5719> to the sick of the palsy <WG3885>,) Arise <WG1453> <WG5685>, take up <WG142> <WG5657> thy <WG4675> bed <WG2825>, and <WG2532> go <WG5217> <WG5720> unto <WG1519> thine <WG4675> house <WG3624>.
And <WG2532> he arose <WG1453> <WG5685>, and departed <WG565> <WG5627> to <WG1519> his <WG846> house <WG3624>.

But <WG1161> when the multitudes <WG3793> saw <WG1492> <WG5631> it, they marvelled <WG2296> <WG5656>, and <WG2532> glorified <WG1392> <WG5656> 'Elohim <WG2316>, which <WG3588> had given <WG1325> <WG5631> such <WG5108> power <WG1849> unto men <WG444>.

And as <WG2532> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> passed forth <WG3855> <WG5723> from thence <WG1564>, he saw <WG1492> <WG5627> a man <WG444>, named <WG3004> <WG5746> Mattit-yahu <WG3156>, sitting <WG2521> <WG5740> at <WG1909> the receipt of custom <WG5058>: and <WG2532> he saith <WG3004> <WG5719> unto him <WG846>, Follow <WG190> <WG5720> me <WG3427>. And <WG2532> he arose <WG450> <WG5631>, and followed <WG190> <WG5656> him <WG846>.

And <WG2532> it came to pass <WG1096> <WG5633>, as Yeshuw`a <WG2424> sat at meat <WG345> <WG5740> in <WG1722> the house <WG3614>, <WG2532> behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, many <WG4183> publicans <WG5057> and <WG2532> sinners <WG268> came <WG2064> <WG5631> and sat down <WG4873> <WG5711> with him <WG846> and <WG2532> his <WG846> Talmidim <WG3101>.

And <WG2532> when the P'rushim <WG5330> saw <WG1492> <WG5631> it, they said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto his <WG846> Talmidim <WG3101>, Why <WG1302> eateth <WG2068> <WG5719> your <WG5216> Master <WG1320> with <WG3326> publicans <WG5057> and <WG2532> sinners <WG268>?

But <WG1161> when Yeshuw`a <WG2424> heard <WG191> <WG5660> that, he said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto them <WG846>, They that be <WG2192> <WG5719> whole <WG2480> <WG5723> need <WG5532> not <WG3756> a physician <WG2395>, but <WG235> they that are <WG2192> <WG5723> sick <WG2560>.

But <WG1161> go ye <WG4198> <WG5679> and learn <WG3129> <WG5628> what <WG5101> that meaneth <WG2076> <WG5748>, I will <WG2309> <WG5719> have mercy <WG1656>, and <WG2532> not <WG3756> sacrifice <WG2378>: for <WG1063> I am <WG2064> not <WG3756> come <WG2064> <WG5627> to call <WG2564> <WG5658> the righteous <WG1342>, but <WG235> sinners <WG268> to <WG1519> repentance <WG3341>.

Then <WG5119> came <WG4334> <WG5736> to him <WG846> the Talmidim <WG3101> of Yochanan <WG2491>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, Why <WG1302> do we <WG2249> and <WG2532> the P'rushim <WG5330> fast <WG3522> <WG5719> oft <WG4183>, but <WG1161> thy <WG4675> Talmidim <WG3101> fast <WG3522> <WG5719> not <WG3756>?

And <WG2532> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto them <WG846>, Can <WG3361> <WG1410> <WG5736> the children <WG5207> of the bridechamber <WG3567> mourn <WG3996> <WG5721>, as long as <WG1909> <WG3745> the bridegroom <WG3566> is <WG2076> <WG5748> with <WG3326> them <WG846>? but <WG1161> the days <WG2250> will come <WG2064> <WG5695>, when <WG3752> the bridegroom <WG3566> shall be taken <WG522> <WG5686> from <WG575> them <WG846>, and <WG2532> then <WG5119> shall they fast <WG3522> <WG5692>.

<WG1161> No man <WG3762> putteth <WG1911> <WG5719> a piece <WG1915> of new <WG46> cloth <WG4470> unto <WG1909> an old <WG3820> garment <WG2440>, for <WG1063> that which is put in to fill it up <WG4138> taketh <WG142> <WG5719> <WG846> from <WG575> the garment <WG2440>, and <WG2532> the rent <WG4978> is made <WG1096> <WG5736> worse <WG5501>.

Neither <WG3761> do men put <WG906> <WG5719> new <WG3501> wine <WG3631> into <WG1519> old <WG3820> bottles <WG779>: else <WG1490> the bottles <WG779> break <WG4486> <WG5743>, and <WG2532> the wine <WG3631> runneth out <WG1632> <WG5743>, and <WG2532> the bottles <WG779> perish <WG622> <WG5698>: but <WG235> they put <WG906> <WG5719> new <WG3501> wine <WG3631> into <WG1519> new <WG2537> bottles <WG779>, and <WG2532> both <WG297> are preserved <WG4933> <WG5743>.

While he <WG846> spake <WG2980> <WG5723> these things <WG5023> unto them <WG846>, behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, there came <WG2064> <WG5631> a certain <WG1520> ruler <WG758>, and worshipped <WG4352> <WG5707> him <WG846>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, <WG3754> My <WG3450> daughter <WG2364> is even now <WG737> dead <WG5053> <WG5656>: but <WG235> come <WG2064> <WG5631> and lay <WG2007> <WG5628> thy <WG4675> hand <WG5495> upon <WG1909> her <WG846>, and <WG2532> she shall live <WG2198> <WG5695>.
And <WG2532> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> arose <WG1453> <WG5685>, and followed <WG190> <WG5656> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> so did his <WG846> Talmidim <WG3101>.

And <WG2532>, behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, a woman <WG1135>, which was diseased with an issue of blood <WG131> <WG5723> twelve <WG1427> years <WG2094>, came <WG4334> <WG5631> behind <WG3693> him, and touched <WG680> <WG5662> the hem <WG2899> of his <WG846> garment <WG2440>:

For <WG1063> she said <WG3004> <WG5707> within <WG1722> herself <WG1438>, If <WG1437> I may <WG680> but <WG3440> touch <WG680> <WG5672> his <WG846> garment <WG2440>, I shall be whole <WG4982> <WG5701>.

But <WG1161> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> turned him about <WG1994> <WG5651>, and <WG2532> when he saw <WG1492> <WG5631> her <WG846>, he said <WG2036> <WG5627>, Daughter <WG2364>, be of good comfort <WG2293> <WG5720>; thy <WG4675> faith <WG4102> hath made <WG4982> thee <WG4571> whole <WG4982> <WG5758>. And <WG2532> the woman <WG1135> was made whole <WG4982> <WG5681> from <WG575> that <WG1565> hour <WG5610>.

And <WG2532> when Yeshuw`a <WG2424> came <WG2064> <WG5631> into <WG1519> the ruler's <WG758> house <WG3614>, and <WG2532> saw <WG1492> <WG5631> the minstrels <WG834> and <WG2532> the people <WG3793> making a noise <WG2350> <WG5746>,

He said <WG3004> <WG5719> unto them <WG846>, Give place <WG402> <WG5720>: for <WG1063> the maid <WG2877> is <WG599> not <WG3756> dead <WG599> <WG5627>, but <WG235> sleepeth <WG2518> <WG5719>. And <WG2532> they laughed <WG2606> him <WG846> to scorn <WG2606> <WG5707>.

But <WG1161> when <WG3753> the people <WG3793> were put forth <WG1544> <WG5681>, he went in <WG1525> <WG5631>, and took <WG2902> <WG5656> her <WG846> by the hand <WG5495>, and <WG2532> the maid <WG2877> arose <WG1453> <WG5681>.
And <WG2532> the fame <WG5345> hereof <WG3778> went abroad <WG1831> <WG5627> into <WG1519> all <WG3650> that <WG1565> land <WG1093>.

And <WG2532> when Yeshuw`a <WG2424> departed <WG3855> <WG5723> thence <WG1564>, two <WG1417> blind men <WG5185> followed <WG190> <WG5656> him <WG846>, crying <WG2896> <WG5723>, and <WG2532> saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, Thou Son <WG5207> of David <WG1138>, have mercy <WG1653> <WG5657> on us <WG2248>.

And <WG1161> when he was come <WG2064> <WG5631> into <WG1519> the house <WG3614>, the blind men <WG5185> came <WG4334> <WG5656> to him <WG846>: and <WG2532> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> saith <WG3004> <WG5719> unto them <WG846>, Believe ye <WG4100> <WG5720> that <WG3754> I am able <WG1410> <WG5736> to do <WG4160> <WG5658> this <WG5124>? They said <WG3004> <WG5719> unto him <WG846>, Yea <WG3483>, YY <WG2962>.
Then <WG5119> touched he <WG680> <WG5662> their <WG846> eyes <WG3788>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, According <WG2596> to your <WG5216> faith <WG4102> be it <WG1096> <WG5676> unto you <WG5213>.

And <WG2532> their <WG846> eyes <WG3788> were opened <WG455> <WG5681>; and <WG2532> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> straitly charged <WG1690> <WG5662> them <WG846>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, See <WG3708> <WG5720> that no man <WG3367> know <WG1097> <WG5720> it.
But <WG1161> they, when they were departed <WG1831> <WG5631>, spread abroad <WG1310> his <WG846> fame <WG1310> <WG5656> in <WG1722> all <WG3650> that <WG1565> country <WG1093>.
As <WG1161> they <WG846> went out <WG1831> <WG5740>, behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, they brought <WG4374> <WG5656> to him <WG846> a dumb <WG2974> man <WG444> possessed with a devil <WG1139> <WG5740>.

And <WG2532> when the devil <WG1140> was cast out <WG1544> <WG5685>, the dumb <WG2974> spake <WG2980> <WG5656>: and <WG2532> the multitudes <WG3793> marvelled <WG2296> <WG5656>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, <WG3754> It was never <WG3763> so <WG3779> seen <WG5316> <WG5648> in <WG1722> Yisra'EL <WG2474>.
But <WG1161> the P'rushim <WG5330> said <WG3004> <WG5707>, He casteth out <WG1544> <WG5719> devils <WG1140> through <WG1722> the prince <WG758> of the devils <WG1140>.

And <WG2532> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> went about <WG4013> <WG5707> all <WG3956> the cities <WG4172> and <WG2532> villages <WG2968>, teaching <WG1321> <WG5723> in <WG1722> their <WG846> synagogues <WG4864>, and <WG2532> preaching <WG2784> <WG5723> the gospel <WG2098> of the kingdom <WG932>, and <WG2532> healing <WG2323> <WG5723> every <WG3956> sickness <WG3554> and <WG2532> every <WG3956> disease <WG3119> among <WG1722> the people <WG2992>.

But <WG1161> when he saw <WG1492> <WG5631> the multitudes <WG3793>, he was moved with compassion <WG4697> <WG5675> on <WG4012> them <WG846>, because <WG3754> they fainted <WG2258> <WG5713> <WG1590> <WG5772>, and <WG2532> were scattered abroad <WG4496> <WG5772>, as <WG5616> sheep <WG4263> having <WG2192> <WG5723> no <WG3361> shepherd <WG4166>.
Then <WG5119> saith <WG3004> <WG5719> he unto his <WG846> Talmidim <WG3101>, The harvest <WG2326> truly <WG3303> is plenteous <WG4183>, but <WG1161> the labourers <WG2040> are few <WG3641>;
Pray ye <WG1189> <WG5676> therefore <WG3767> the YY <WG2962> of the harvest <WG2326>, that <WG3704> he will send forth <WG1544> <WG5632> labourers <WG2040> into <WG1519> his <WG846> harvest <WG2326>.
